instructions: Place hands in the center of the chest.
Give 30 chest compressions followed by 2 rescue breaths.
Continue until help arrives or victim recovers.
Ask if they can cough or speak.
If not, perform abdominal thrusts (Heimlich maneuver).
Repeat until object is expelled or help arrives.
Cool the burn under running water for 10-20 minutes.
Remove tight items near the area.
Cover with a clean, non-stick bandage.
Sit upright and lean forward slightly.
Pinch the nose just below the bridge.
Hold for 10 minutes while breathing through mouth.
Avoid blowing nose after bleeding stops.
